abstract: Russia’s gas export monopoly Gazprom will buy majority control of oil major TNK-BP, which is half owned by BP, for $20 billion by the end of the year, the Vedomosti daily reported on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s gas export monopoly Gazprom will buy majority control of oil major TNK-BP, which is half owned by BP, for $20 billion by the end of the year, the Vedomosti daily reported on Thursday.

headline.main: Gazprom to Take Control of TNK-BP for $20 Billion, Report Says
